definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
variant of 淳樸|淳朴[chun2 pu3]
Li Gongpu (-1946), communist killed by Guomindang in Kunming in 1946
Baopuzi, collection of essays by Ge Hong 葛洪[Ge3 Hong2] on alchemy, immortality, legalism, society etc
Bai Pu (1226-1306), Yuan dynasty dramatist in the 雜劇|杂剧 tradition of musical comedy, one of the Four Great Yuan dramatists 元曲四大家

sentences.english: Piao Neng in tender latter two stores the year to be pregnant again is more ideal.
sentences.chinese: 樸能在嬌後兩屯年再懷孕較爲理想。

sentences.english: I try to guess what the other person will say next in English.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試猜猜別葌樸下來要說的英文是什麼。

sentences.english: But Ms Park could salvage a little dignity by ending the circus now.
sentences.chinese: 但在剛結束的集會中，樸女士可以挽回一點尊嚴。

sentences.english: Now, cut the staff back to Ho Park of Harbin to seek business opportunities.
sentences.chinese: 現在，裁掉了員工的樸之浩回到哈爾濱尋找商機。

sentences.english: South Korea's Taekyong Park finished third in 13.66 seconds.
sentences.chinese: 韓國選手樸泰硬跑出13秒66，獲得第三。

sentences.english: Which is the most popular surname in South Korea?
sentences.chinese: 在韓國，姓“樸”和姓“金”的最多。

sentences.english: So says Park Cheol-hwan, a North Korean defector now living in Seoul, the South Korean capital.
sentences.chinese: 現居韓國首都首爾的脫北者樸哲煥如是說。

sentences.english: Please tell Mr. Paik I'm sorry.
sentences.chinese: 請告訴樸先生我很抱歉。

sentences.english: Teach Piao told us to write a diary, so I am.
sentences.chinese: 樸老師告訴了我們寫一篇日記，所以我要寫。

sentences.english: Selection of high quality earrings, on the Park Road Cikuan heart-shaped diamond highlights show.
sentences.chinese: 高品質的耳釘精選，就在樸道此款心形加亮水鑽呈現。

sentences.english: Tub need add knit fabric, use matching color stitch on the tub edge.
sentences.chinese: 筒內加針織樸，筒邊車邊用撞色線。

sentences.english: Park Young-man is the executive director of the Corporation of Kaesong Industrial Council.
sentences.chinese: 樸英曼是開城工業局公司的執行董事。

sentences.english: Cui Ying really asked PiaoZhongHao, see all this section chief is deliberately against her.
sentences.chinese: 崔英真問了樸鍾浩，明白了這一切是科長故意針對她。

sentences.english: Park's mother found his body in his home early Wednesday morning, the news agency reported.
sentences.chinese: 樸龍河的母親星期三早晨在他家裏發現他的屍體。

to neglect/to skip (class or work)/to waste (time)/vast/loose-fitting

ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)
